title: Clayton Kershaw to start Game 4 of NLDS on short rest for Dodgers
text:
Published By: Fox News: Sports - Today 
There was some debate as to whether Clayton Kershaw would pitch Game 4 of the NLDS after the concerning end to his Game 1 start....
